name: EVO-IP
0:
”Alexa, open evolution IP”
”Alexa, tell evolution ip to select Matrix”
”Alexa launch evolution i. p.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: evolution i. p.
des:
Evolution IP skill allows the EVOIP HDMI over IP system to controlled using an Amazon Echo, Dot, or similar product.

 

The EVO-IP system and products are intended to be professionally installed and setup. A valid login and account will be needed in order to enable and use the skill

 Version:1.0.0
